name: Maguite
description:
Maguite is a 2D platform adventure where you control a mage trying to get her magic back and return to the forest from a world conquered by the machines.

The game is actually just an experiment for me to learn game development. It's really short, a sort of vertical slice, that most likely will never be completed.

But it took me so long to create it that I want to share it.

Follow me on Instagram!  @pablo__cuello Or Twitter! https://twitter.com/pablo__cuello
